title: 95/53/EC: Commission Decision of 28 February 1995 amending Decision 93/411/EEC authorizing Member States to provide for derogations from certain provisions of Council Directive 77/93/EEC in respect of plants of strawberry (Fragaria L.), intended for planting, other than seeds, originating in Argentina
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 28 February 1995 amending Decision 93/411/EEC authorizing Member States to provide for derogations from certain provisions of Council Directive 77/93/EEC in respect of plants of strawberry (Fragaria L.), intended for  planting, other than seeds, originating in Argentina (95/53/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 28 February 1995.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 26, 31. 1. 1977, p. 20.
(2) OJ No L 92, 9. 4. 1994, p. 27.
(3) OJ No L 182, 24. 7. 1993, p. 63.
